metadata.author: analyst5
metadata.description: Use to detects malicious extentions from email attachments.

GoogleChronicleBackstory.Rules(val.ruleI.ruleText:
rule malicious_extensions {
  meta:
    author = "analyst5"
    description = "Use to detects malicious extentions from email attachments."
    severity = "High"

  events:
    $event.metadata.event_type = "EMAIL_TRANSACTION"
    $event.about.file.mime_type = /^.*\.(com|exe|bat|cmd|cpl|jar|js|msi|rar|reg)$/

  condition:
      $event
    
}

metadata.author: Markus Neis
metadata.description: Detects EmpireMonkey APT reported Activity  License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md.

GoogleChronicleBackstory.Rules(val.ruleI.ruleText:
rule empire_monkey {
	meta:
		author = "Markus Neis"
		description = "Detects EmpireMonkey APT reported Activity  License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md."
		reference = "https://tdm.socprime.com/tdm/info/jFbYfF51ECXh"
		version = "0.01"
		created = "2019/04/02"
		category = "process_creation"
		product = "windows"
		mitre = "t1086, execution"

	events:
(re.regex($selection_cutil.target.process.command_line, `.*/i:%APPDATA%\\logs\.txt scrobj\.dll`) and (re.regex($selection_cutil.target.process.file.full_path, `.*\\cutil\.exe`) or $selection_cutil.metadata.description = "Microsoft(C) Registerserver"))

	condition:
		$selection_cutil
}
